text: Robert Roderick Meyers (August 11, 1924 - March 22, 2014) was a Canadian ice hockey player. He was a member of the Edmonton Mercurys that won a gold medal at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo, Norway. ==Other websites== * *Robert Meyers' profile at Sports Reference.com *Robert Meyers' obituary Category:1924 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Olympic gold medalists for Canada Category:Ice hockey people from Alberta Category:Sportspeople from Edmonton
title: Robert Meyers (ice hockey)
